snippet.title: The Lost Cube - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Ulrik must find the magical red cube that combined with his guitar can breathe life back into his village. Patience and focus will be your guide as you face the evils that stand in your way. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1399280/The_Lost_Cube/


Check out other games: 


1. Ellen - 2D Pixel Art Game
Platform: Steam, Nintendo Switch, Xbox and PlayStation
URL: https://store.steampowered.com/app/822920/Ellen/
PlayStation Store: https://tinyurl.com/yya8t4yx
Xbox Store: https://tinyurl.com/y5cghout
Nintendo Switch Store: https://tinyurl.com/y3uchowf

2. Deer Man (Storytelling Experience) 
Platform: Steam
URL: https://store.steampowered.com/app/459940/Deer_Man/
VR Supported: Oculus & HTC Vive


Visit Official Site: http://www.redmountmedia.com
